title: Baelnorn
html:
Baelnorn

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
L baelnorn (No tile)
Difficulty 22
Attacks Touch 3d6 acid, Gaze attack 0d0 spore, Cast 0d0 mage spell
L baelnorn (No tile)
Difficulty 22
Attacks

Touch 3d6 acid, Gaze attack 0d0 spore, Cast 0d0 mage spell

Base level 17
Base experience 497
Speed 9
Base AC −4
Base MR 90
Alignment −15 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 1 (Very rare)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 1200
Nutritional value 100
Size medium
Resistances sleep, poison, acid, petrification
Resistances conveyed acid

A baelnorn:

  • can survive underwater.
  • does not breathe.
  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • regenerates HP quickly.
  • is poisonous to eat.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is undead.
  • is an elf.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • can pick up magical items.
  • wants the Amulet of Yendor.
  • wants the Book of the Dead.
  • wants the Amulet of Yendor, the Bell of Opening, the Book of the Dead, the Candelabrum of Invocation, and your quest artifact.
  • has infravision.
  • appears only in Gehennom.
  • never leaves a corpse.
  • resists death magic.

Baelnorns are elven liches that can be encountered in dNetHack. They are closely associated with dungeon ferns, having an acid-element touch attack and the dungeon fern's spore-creating ability.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

'''Baelnorns''' are [[Elf (monster attribute)|elven]] [[Lich (monster class)|liches]] that can be encountered in [[dNetHack]]. They are closely associated with [[dungeon fern]]s, having an [[acid]]-element touch attack and the dungeon fern's spore-creating ability.
